title: Voicemail notification can't be disabled after latest update
content:
What is this?!!!
Pixel 4 is the actual garbage. Never buying a Google phone again. I can't count the unacceptable bugs in this thing on all my fingers and toes.

latest android update added this, can't turn off voicemail notifications. Now this trash is objectively even worse.

I hope someone can tell me how to clear this, it's on my home screen 100% of the time, wasting the oled screen that was the reason I bought this. But honestly, I'm over it, I think I'm literally going to switch back to my iphone 7 after 9 months of using the pixel 4. And I know I'm not alone seeing as google just discontinued the f'n thing.
